One day, Joseph receives news that Anna has died unexpectedly from an infection. The news devastates Joseph and his daughters, especially Anna's death.

The movie explores themes such as grief, loss, love, family, and life itself.

Based on the user's message, they seem interested in the drama genre. Here are two highly rated drama films that you might enjoy:

1. The Shawshank Redemption (1994)
This classic drama tells the story of a banker named Andy Dufresne who is wrongfully convicted of murder and sent to Shawshank State Penitentiary.

Andy befriends the warden, Red, and together they work to maintain their hope and dignity in the face of adversity.

2. Forrest Gump (1994)
This timeless drama tells the story of an ordinary man named Forrest Gump who experiences many important events in American history through his own unique perspective.

Forrest becomes friends with several iconic figures from American history, including President John F. Kennedy, First Lady Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis, and President Lyndon B. Johnson.

Through his own独特的 perspective, Forrest Gump experiences many important events in American history that have had a profound impact on the course of history in America.

2. "The Martian" (2015) - Directed by Ridley Scott, this science fiction film follows the story of Mark Watney, an astronaut who becomes stranded on Mars after his team believes he has died in space.
